messages.title: FAIR IS WORTH FIGHTING FOR
messages.content: Andy is from South Wales and has lived in Greenwich for 5 years. With the Green Party Andy works hard on issues including health, public services, jobs and workers' rights, climate change and with the anti-war movement.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Full public funding of the NHS, providing the best quality of care for all, locally, and free at the point of delivery.
The creation of thousands of jobs through public investment in green energy and public transport, not Trident or the war.
Decent pensions and a proper living wage for all.

mentions.candidate: Andy campaigns for action against climate change

issues.environment: Andy campaigns for action against climate change.

leaflet.personalStatement: Andy is from South Wales and has lived in Greenwich for 5 years. With the Green Party Andy works hard on issues including health, public services, jobs and workers' rights, climate change and with the anti-war movement.
